description: Contains proteome data required for submission to PRIDE.

analyzer.description: Single or multiple components of the mass analyzer, children terms of MS:1000443, e.g. MS:1000081 quadrupole.

checksums.description: One or more checksums used to ensure file integrity.

date.description: Date on which the spectra were generated.

data_processing_protocol.description: A short description of the data processing protocol followed to generate associated data sets.

detector.description: Detector type used, children terms of MS:1000026 e.g. MS:1000114: microchannel plate detector.

exp_description.description: Description of the goals and objectives of this study, summary of the abstract, optimally 2-3 sentences.

instrument_name.description: Descriptive name of the instrument make, model, significant customizations.

processing_method.description: Description of the default peak processing method, children terms of MS:1000452, e.g. MS:1000033 deisotoping.

protmod_format.description: File format of the file(s) containing data.

protmod_url.description: An array of URLs to list(s) of protein modifications, using the PSI-MOD ontology.

protocol_name.description: Protocol title with versioning, ideally pointing to a url.

protocol_steps.description: Description of the sample processing steps that have been performed, using PRIDE cv eg <cvParam cvLabel="PRIDE" accession="PRIDE:0000026" name="Alkylation" value="iodoacetamide" />.

reference.description: Links to any literature citations for which this experiment provides supporting evidence, required once available.

result_url.description: An array of URLs from where result files can be obtained. The files are supposed to be in mzIdentML 1.1 format

peak_format.description: File format of the file(s) containing data.

peak_url.description: An array of URLs from where peak files can be obtained.

raw_url.description: An array of URLs from where raw files can be obtained

other_url.description: An array of URLs from where other related files can be obtained

sample_description.description: Expansible description of the sample used to generate the dataset, recommended ontologies NEWT and BTO, eg <cvParam cvLabel="NEWT" accession="10090" name="Mus musculus (Mouse)" />.

sample_name.description: A short label that is referable to the sample used to generate the dataset.

search_engine.description: Name of the protein search engine used, e.g. Mascot 2.2.1.

short_label.description: Nomenclature used to group/organize experiments in a meaningful way, e.g. Control Exp II.

software.description: All software used during data acquisition and data processing, including the software that produced the peak list, with versions.

source.description: Ion source information, child of term MS:1000008, e.g. MS:1000398 nanoelectrospray.

study.description: One of the 3 studies that are part of the iHMP.

tags.description: An array of descriptive strings to make the node 'taggable'.

xml_generation.description: Software used to generate the PRIDE xml file, e.g. PRIDE Converter Toolsuite 2.0.
